trans-unit.source: Defines the abstract base class for composable parts, which import objects and produce exported objects.
trans-unit.target: Definisce la classe base astratta per parti componibili che importano oggetti e producono oggetti esportati.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" />.

trans-unit.source: Called when all the imports of the part have been set, and exports can be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando vengono impostate tutte le importazioni della parte ed è possibile recuperare le esportazioni.

trans-unit.source: Once this method is called, no further imports can be set unless a call is made to Deactivate.
trans-unit.target: Quando questo metodo viene chiamato, è non possono impostare alcuna ulteriori importazioni a meno che non viene eseguita una chiamata a disattivare.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> objects that describe the exported objects provided by the part.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta degli oggetti <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> che descrivono gli oggetti esportati forniti dalla parte.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> objects that describe the exported objects provided by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" />.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di oggetti <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> che descrivono gli oggetti esportati forniti da <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> object was created from a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> object, this property should return the result of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition.ExportDefinitions%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> oggetto è stato creato da un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> dell'oggetto, questa proprietà deve restituire il risultato di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition.ExportDefinitions%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Overrides of this property should never return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override di questa proprietà non devono restituire mai `null`.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> does not have exports, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection instead.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> non dispone di esportazioni, viene restituito un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> raccolta invece.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> object has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> objects from the <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart.ExportDefinitions" /> property that describes the exported object to return.
trans-unit.target: Uno degli oggetti <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> dalla proprietà <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart.ExportDefinitions" /> che descrive l'oggetto esportato da restituire.

trans-unit.source: Gets the exported object described by the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto esportato descritto dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The exported object described by <paramref name="definition" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto esportato descritto da <paramref name="definition" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> object has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="definition" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="definition" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred getting the exported object described by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" />.
trans-unit.target: Si è verificato un errore durante il recupero dell'oggetto esportato descritto dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="definition" /> did not originate from the <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart.ExportDefinitions" /> property on the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="definition" /> non è stato originato dalla proprietà <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart.ExportDefinitions" /> nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" />.

trans-unit.source: One or more prerequisite imports, indicated by <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.IsPrerequisite" />, have not been set.
trans-unit.target: Una o più importazioni necessarie, indicate dalla proprietà <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.IsPrerequisite" />, non sono state impostate.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition" /> objects that describe the imported objects required by the part.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta degli oggetti <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition" /> che descrivono gli oggetti importati richiesti dalla parte.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition" /> objects that describe the imported objects required by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" />.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di oggetti <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition" /> che descrivono gli oggetti importati richiesti da <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> object was created from a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> object, this property should return the result of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition.ImportDefinitions%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> oggetto è stato creato da un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> dell'oggetto, questa proprietà deve restituire il risultato di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition.ImportDefinitions%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Overrides of this property should never return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override di questa proprietà non devono restituire mai `null`.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> does not have imports, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection instead.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> non dispongono di importazioni, viene restituito un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> raccolta invece.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> object has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the metadata of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene i metadati dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" />.

trans-unit.source: The metadata of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Metadati dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty, read-only <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object.
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione predefinita è un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> vuoto di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> object was created from a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> object, this property should return the result of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition.Metadata%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> oggetto è stato creato da un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> dell'oggetto, questa proprietà deve restituire il risultato di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition.Metadata%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Overrides of this property should return a read-only <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object with a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparer, such as <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A>, and should never return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override di questa proprietà devono restituire una sola lettura <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> oggetto con un operatore di confronto non linguistico, distinzione maiuscole/minuscole, ad esempio <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A>e non devono mai restituire `null`.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> does not contain metadata, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> instead.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> non contengono i metadati, viene restituito un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> invece.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> object has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: One of the objects from the <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart.ImportDefinitions" /> property that specifies the import to be set.
trans-unit.target: Uno degli oggetti dalla proprietà <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart.ImportDefinitions" /> che specifica l'importazione da impostare.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export" /> objects of which to set the import described by <c>definition</c>.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di oggetti <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export" /> di cui impostare l'importazione descritta da <c>definizione</c>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the import described by the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition" /> object to be satisfied by the specified exports.
trans-unit.target: Imposta l'importazione descritta dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition" /> specificato che deve essere soddisfatta dalle esportazioni specificate.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> object has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="definition" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="definition" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="exports" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="exports" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred setting the import described by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Si è verificato un errore durante l'impostazione dell'importazione descritta dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="definition" /> did not originate from the <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart.ImportDefinitions" /> property on the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="definition" /> non è stato originato dalla proprietà <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart.ImportDefinitions" /> nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="exports" /> contains an element that is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="exports" /> contiene un elemento <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="exports" /> is empty and <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.Cardinality" /> is <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality.ExactlyOne" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="exports" /> è vuoto e la proprietà <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.Cardinality" /> è <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality.ExactlyOne" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="exports" /> contains more than one element and <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.Cardinality" /> is <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality.ZeroOrOne" /> or <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality.ExactlyOne" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="exports" /> contiene più di un elemento e la proprietà <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.Cardinality" /> è <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality.ZeroOrOne" /> o <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality.ExactlyOne" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart.SetImport(System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export})" /> has been previously called and <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.IsRecomposable" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart.SetImport(System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export})" /> è stato chiamato in precedenza e la proprietà <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.IsRecomposable" /> è <see langword="false" />.
